EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-NANOGemailers-T003MA.Email - Remind
EmailTemplate.subject: NANOG 75 kicks off today. Meet us there?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> NANOG 75 kicks off today. Meet us there? If you’re into peering, this is the place to be! San Francisco, February 18 - 20 Discover how Nokia can help you take control of your internet peering edge.
- Learn how to address peering issues such as latency, performance and security - See our automated peering engineering and DDoS mitigation demos supported by Network Services Platform (NSP), Deepfield analytics and FP4-based IP routing solutions - Find out about our massively scalable IP networking solutions
Our experts will be there to discuss your specific needs and challenges in detail, but until then: Meet Nokia at NANOG 75 Tuesday, February 19
6:00 – 8:00pm
Meet our experts and join us at the Beer ‘n Gear in the Pacific Concourse
Wednesday, February 20
10:30 – 11:30am
5G: An IP Engineer Perspective <[[https://pc.nanog.org/static/published/meetings/NANOG75/daily/day_4.html#talk_1875]]>, Igor Giangrossi, Principal Consulting Engineer View the event page and register at NANOG 75 <[[http://www.cvent.com/events/nanog-75/custom-116-948222eca5834bc2b7a679399063e724.aspx]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
